A very simple app that turns your screen on for a specified period time when you get a notification. If your device is in your pocket or the proximity sensor is otherwise covered, the screen will not turn on.
Any ideas or feature requests are welcome, please email me with them.
If you would like to translate this app, please visit the following link: https://www.transifex.com/projects/p/screen-notifications/
If you have issues or enhancements, fork me on github: https://github.com/lkorth/screen-notifications
When the service is enabled, the screen will turn on when notifications are received.
You will now be taken to your device\'s Notification Access screen.\n \n If you wish to stop Spark Notifications, disable its notifications access.

You will now be taken to your device's Notification Access screen.
 
 For this app to work, it is required to enable its access to notifications in order to wake the screen when notifications are received.
 
 Spark Notifications never reads the content of your notifications. This is an open-source app, which means that anyone can see exactly what the app does by looking at its source code, available at github.com/notSorin/spark-notifications .
